input.sentences: i went to the party last week .
i gave them a lot of flowers .
output.sentences: "Ralph!", I yelled at my crazy son, " A funeral is NOT the place for a damned snakes on a plane hat!"
Lisa laughed hysterically because Granny loved snakes, Lydia chose to pretend she hadn't seen a thing.
Rick, being the mature twin, appropriately hugged everyone as his brother stared evilly.
Ralph, forever the lunatic prankster, sneaked to the casket, pulled a grass snake out of his pocket and watched it slither into the beautiful flowers.
Following the screams of profanity which filled the room as the casket was dropped, Rick grabbed his king hat from the trunk of his car and proclaimed that Ralph should be beheaded.
